body:
Comment 1: 
In the original proposal, the detailed rules were not specified; the semantics of the
specific example you are mentioning is not obvious. As it is now, the 2nd argument(s) to
append must be assignment compatible to the slice (1st argument). If the 1st argument is
(an untyped) nil, assignment compatibility is meaningless.

One could add extra rules to make it work, but since one can always use copy in this
case, we decided against that.
_Status changed to **WorkingAsIntended**._
